meanings.sent1: Her gluttonousness at the buffet surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: His gluttonousness for sweets led to cavities.
meanings.sent3: The dog's gluttonousness for treats made him do tricks.
meanings.sent4: The gluttonousness of the fire consumed the forest.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonousness of the toddler for cookies was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming more than necessary
meanings.sent1: The gluttonousness of the party guests left no leftovers.
meanings.sent2: His gluttonousness for attention made him the center of the room.
meanings.sent3: The gluttonousness of the car's gas tank surprised the driver.
meanings.sent4: The gluttonousness of the bookworm devoured the library's collection.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonousness of the shopper filled their cart to the brim.

meanings.definition: Greediness in indulging in food or drink
meanings.sent1: Her gluttonousness for chocolate knew no bounds.
meanings.sent2: The gluttonousness of the king's feast impressed the guests.
meanings.sent3: The cat's gluttonousness for tuna made it a favorite at the shelter.
meanings.sent4: The gluttonousness of the storm flooded the streets.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonousness of the party host delighted the attendees.
